description: Detects embeding of files with usage of steghide binary, the adversaries may use this technique to prevent the detection of hidden information. Author: Pawel Mazur. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Steganography Hide Files with Steghide
query: (type:"EXECVE" AND a0:"steghide" AND a1:"embed" AND a2:("\-cf" OR "\-ef") AND a4:("\-cf" OR "\-ef"))
